name: The Final Countdown Prototype
description:
*This is our prototype for The Final Countdown. Unfortunately, we got too ambitious on making this game under two days. It is about an epic murder mystery with a supernatural twist that combines gameplay and story. We work so hard on this and you can get a good 3-5min of the theme, music/sound, art, story, and gameplay. After reaching the hallway, there is no more gameplay and you may exit the game by going to your notepad. Please check it out, and thank you!

Programmer/Designer:

Ivan Navarro-Espinoza

Twitter: @kfcpop2112

Artist:

Marielos Navarro

Writer:

Maninder Suman

Music Composer:

Paul Melancon
